Polymorph Caster:#3070 Chunari
Can only be cast by :#3069 Namanari
Unit gets magic of target :1
 
(No Effect on Undead [undeadimmune], May Use Underwater [uwok], No effect on Inanimate [inanimateimmune])
The Namanari seals a pact with the Oni Kings, giving up her humanity to become a Chunari. The Chunari gains powers in death and fire magic and a demonic nature. Jealous and greedy for power a Chunari will sooner or later strengthen her pact with her masters losing her humanity altogether.
